name: Kirby's Egg Catcher Deluxe
description:
It's the classic sub game from Kirby's Adventure!

Choose a difficulty setting and try to catch as many eggs as you can without catching any bombs! Includes three levels in Normal Mode and Endless Mode.

Normal Mode:

The original Egg Catcher sub game, King Dedede will throw 30 eggs in total, and the goal is to get as close to a perfect score as you can!

Endless Mode:

King Dedede will throw an endless amount of eggs at Kirby, just aim for a high score!
